com.ericharlow.DragNDrop
Interface DragListener

public interface DragListener

Implement to handle an item being dragged.

Author:
Eric Harlow

Method Summary
 void onDrag(int x, int y, ListView listView)
          Called when a drag is to be performed.
 void onStartDrag(View itemView)
          Called when a drag starts.
 void onStopDrag(View itemView)
          Called when a drag stops.
 

Method Detail

onStartDrag

void onStartDrag(View itemView)
Called when a drag starts.

Parameters:
itemView - - the view of the item to be dragged i.e. the drag view

onDrag

void onDrag(int x,
            int y,
            ListView listView)
Called when a drag is to be performed.

Parameters:
x - - horizontal coordinate of MotionEvent.
y - - verital coordinate of MotionEvent.
listView - - the listView

onStopDrag

void onStopDrag(View itemView)
Called when a drag stops. Any changes in onStartDrag need to be undone here so that the view can be used in the list again.

Parameters:
itemView - - the view of the item to be dragged i.e. the drag view
